sentences.en: After due consideration it was decided to send him away to live with foster parents.
sentences.cn: 充分考虑之后决定将他送到养父母那儿生活。

sentences.en: He may have had some suspicions of Michael Foster, the editor of the journal.
sentences.cn: 他可能对杂志主编迈克尔·福斯特有些怀疑。

sentences.en: It might be possible for a single woman to be accepted as a foster parent.
sentences.cn: 有可能会接受单身女子作为领养人。

sentences.en: Little Jack was placed with foster parents.
sentences.cn: 小杰克和养父母住在一起。

sentences.en: Mason was uninhibited in his questions about Foster's family.
sentences.cn: 梅森就福斯特的家庭毫无顾忌地发问。

sentences.en: Mr Foster romped home with 141 votes.
sentences.cn: 福斯特先生以141票轻松获胜。
现今年轻夫妇有时领养别人的孩子.

sentences.en: The bishop helped foster the sense of a community embracing all classes.
sentences.cn: 主教鼓励一种包容各个阶层的社区精神。

sentences.en: The bright and telegenic Miss Foster is being paid around £90,000 a year for her exclusive deal.
sentences.cn: 福斯特小姐头脑聪明，镜头感十足，凭其独家节目拿到约9万英镑的年薪。

sentences.en: The captain did his best to foster a sense of unity among the new recruits.
sentences.cn: 队长尽力培养新成员之间的团结精神.

sentences.en: The children were waiting for placement in a foster care home.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子在抚育院等待安置。

sentences.en: The club's aim is to foster better relations within the community.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部的宗旨是促进团体内部的关系。

sentences.en: The couple wanted to adopt a black child they had been fostering.
sentences.cn: 那对夫妇想收养他们代养的一个黑人小孩。

sentences.en: The President is keen to notch a political triumph that would foster freer world trade and faster economic growth.
sentences.cn: 总统渴望获得政治胜利，以促使世界贸易更为自由，经济发展更为迅速。

sentences.en: The winners are as follows: E. Walker; R. Foster; R. Gates; A. Mackintosh.
sentences.cn: 优胜者分别是：E.沃克、R.福斯特、R.盖茨和A.麦金托什。

sentences.en: They suspected that Neville had traded secret information with Mr Foster.
sentences.cn: 他们怀疑内维尔和福斯特先生交换了秘密情报。

phrases.tran_cn: 寄养家庭；抚养孤儿的家庭
n. 朱迪·福斯特（美国女演员）

trans.tran_en: Foster parents are people who officially take a child into their family for a period of time, without becoming the child's legal parents. The child is referred to as their foster child.

trans.tran_cn: (Foster)人名；(英、捷、意、葡、法、德、俄、西)福斯特
促进，鼓励，培养，代养，抚育，照料(他人子女一段时间)
trans.tran_en: to help a skill, feeling, idea etc develop over a period of time
to help a skill, feeling, idea etc develop over a period of time
